message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $165.  I believe this product will be a valuable asset to you, even at that price.
I understand that $165 is a better offer, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?
